title: Ping / Fps
body: I think it would be nice that if we get a separate bar of our ping before we join a game, eg: showing our ping fps and other details.  on the launcher screen, I understand that you can join a game ( Which i do to check it ) but its a long process and many people overlook it, it can easily be solved by showing fps and ping in-game at the launcher screen if that's someone able to be made it would be really useful since i keep seeing players who say they lag and forget to check their fps and ping before joining a game. thanks :L
